圈.definition: circle; ring; loop (CL:個|个[ge4]); classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc; to surround; to circle

圈內.definition: among insiders; within the community (of publishers, cyclists or cosplayers etc); (esp.) in show business circles

圈圈.definition: to draw a circle; cliques; circles

圈圈點點.definition: annotations made in a book; fig. remarks and comments; to have an opinion on everything

圈地.definition: staking a claim to territory; enclosure

圈定.definition: to highlight sth by drawing a circle around it; (fig.) to designate; to delineate

圈粉.definition: (neologism c. 2015) (coll.) to win (sb) over as a fan; to garner new fans

圈錢.definition: (coll.) (neologism c. 2006) to raise money then misappropriate it

圈養.definition: to rear (an animal) in an enclosure

圈點.definition: to mark a text with dots and circles; to punctuate
